original_title: Heer, Stahl und Sturm – Die Zschäpe-Anwälte
overview: The young lawyers Wolfgang Heer, Wolfgang Stahl and Anja Sturm are Beate Zschäpe's defence lawyers. "Die Story" has accompanied the lawyers over the past five years. A documentary from the depths of the NSU trial.
title: Heer, Stahl und Sturm – Die Zschäpe-Anwälte
